Uses of Interface
com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.timeline.ITimelineObjectEditor

  • Packages that use ITimelineObjectEditor 
    Package Description
    com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer
    The right-hand side of any Gantt chart is a layer container, which is responsible for managing the various layer types.
    com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system
    Contains the system layers for drawing the background, grid lines, popups, relationships, controls, spreadsheets, overviews, global events and activities.
    com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.timeline
    Classes that deal with timeline layers and the rendering and the selection of timeline objects.

    • Uses of ITimelineObjectEditor in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer

      Methods in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer that return ITimelineObjectEditor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ITimelineObjectEditor LayerContainer.getTimelineObjectEditor(Class cl)
      Returns a timeline object editor for an object.
      Methods in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer with parameters of type ITimelineObjectEditor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LayerContainer.setTimelineObjectEditor(Class objectType, ITimelineObjectEditor editor)
      Maps the implementation of a timeline object editor to a class definition.

    • Uses of ITimelineObjectEditor in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system

      Methods in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system that return ITimelineObjectEditor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ITimelineObjectEditor EditingLayer.getTimelineObjectEditor()
      Returns the currently used timeline object editor.

    • Uses of ITimelineObjectEditor in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.timeline

      Classes in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.timeline that implement ITimelineObjectEditor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractTimelineObjectEditor
      An abstract timeline object editor implementation, which provides functionality common to most editors.
      class  DefaultActivityObjectEditor
      A timeline object editor used for editing activity objects.
      class  DefaultTimelineObjectEditor
      A timeline object editor used for editing basic attributes of a timeline object.
